skill_e.tooltip:
Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing ? magic damage and marking the first enemy or smoke cloud hit.

Re-cast: Dash to the marked target, dealing ? magic damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

skill_q.tooltip:
Slings kunai in an arc, dealing ? magic damage. Enemies at the tip are briefly slowed.

At max rank, deals ? damage to minions and monsters.

skill_r.tooltip:
Two dashes: The first vaults over target enemy champion, dealing ? physical damage to all enemies Akali dashes over. Akali can dash again after ? seconds.

The second is an untargeted piercing thrust that executes, dealing ? to ? magic damage based on missing health.

skill_w.tooltip:
Drops a smoke bomb, unleashing a spreading cover of smoke lasting ? seconds.

Akali gains 30/35/40/45/50% decaying movement speed for ? seconds.

The smoke grants Akali invisibility while she is in it.

Stealth - Invisible: Akali can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
